title: Nursing assistant accused of sexually assaulting child at N.H. hospital
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime The child was being treated at the hospital, according to police.
ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A nursing assistant has been charged for allegedly sexually assaulting a child being treated at the New Hampshire hospital where he works.
